The University radio station KJHK is moving from  located at  W PERIOD eleventh St. to its new studio on the third floor of the Kansas Union this Thursday PERIOD In preparation for the move KJHK is sponsoring different events to celebrate PERIOD

inlinetext title align textcontentinlinetext

The studio will feature new equipment which Pat Strathman a freshman from Seneca and a member of KJHKs sports staff said is a core reason for the move PERIOD

 Strathman said of the current studio PERIOD 

Strathman said he thought the move would attract more students to KJHK and possibly result in more listeners PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

The new studio has been under construction since Feb PERIOD  PERIOD
